hotel_name_: Savoy Hotel Manila - Multiple Use Hotel
location: Andrews Avenue Newport City, Pasay, 1309 Manila, Philippines
description: Savoy Hotel Manila features of an outdoor swimming pool, located 200 m from Resorts World Manila, this 4-star property offers  24-hour front desk and an on-site restaurant and bar. Every room at Savoy Hotel Manila is air-conditioned and has a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box, and a desk. A private bathroom with walk in shower and free toiletries is also include in each room. Other units are equipped with a mini-bar, a tea/coffee maker, and have an access to the Executive Lounge. A daily breakfast is available at the property while room service is also available. Savoy Cafe also serves International cuisine, ala carte. At the hotel, facilities such as a gym and a steam and sauna room are available for guests. On-site parking is available. City of Dreams Manila is 1.7 mi, while Glorietta Mall is 2.2 mi away. The nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 1.2 mi from the hotel.

description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at OYO 714 Haeinsa Condotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is  In a great location, the Haeinsa Condotel has homey and comfortable accommodations just 1.6 km from Kamuning MRT Station. The University of the Philippines, Diliman is 6.4 km away, and Manila International Airport can be reached in a 14.5 km drive. At Leez Inn Makati all rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Shangri-La Plaza is 4 km from Leez Inn Makati, while Bonifacio High Street is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ninoy Aquino International Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

location: 706 Shaw Boulevard, Pasig, 1600 Manila, Philippines
description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Privato Ortigas - Multiple Use Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is  Set in the City of Manila, 1 mi from Shangri-La Plaza and 1.2 mi from SM Megamall, Privato Hotel features a roof deck swimming pool, an on site restaurant and bar, and WiFi access throughout the property. The rooms at Privato Hotel is fitted with air conditioning, a wardrobe, and a safety deposit box. The rooms include a seating area with flat-screen cable TV, a working desk, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A refrigerator is also included in each room. The hotel offers 3 dining options including the Piazza Privato, which serves an array of international cuisines, the Privato Cafe, for some afternoon coffee and pastry cravings, and the Verona Roofdeck, perfect for an after-meal cocktails with views of the city. While room service is available, the city offers other dining options. Guests may relax and unwind at the spa after a day's activity in the city. At Privato Hotel, you will find a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. The hotel also houses meeting spaces and luggage storage space. Airport shuttle services can be arranged at an additional charge. The accommodations is within a 5-minute drive from Ortigas Business District while the nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 7.3 mi away from the property.

description: RedDoorz @ Moonwalk Paranaque features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Parañaque district of Manila. The property is located 7.4 km from Newport Mall, 8 km from Mall of Asia Arena and 8.2 km from SMX Convention Center. The property has a 24-hour front desk as well as free WiFi. hotel_name_: Century Park Hotel - Multiple Use Hotel and Staycation Approved
location: 599 P. Ocampo St. Malate, 1004 Manila, Philippines
description: The 4-star Century Park Hotel - Multiple Use Hotel and Staycation Approved is located in Manila, a 5-minute drive from The Cultural Center of the Philippines and the Philippine International Convention Center. It features an outdoor pool, spa treatments and 8 dining options are available while WiFi is free throughout the property. Modern and air-conditioned, all rooms come with cable TV channels, a personal safe and a tea/coffee maker. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub and some rooms have a flat-screen TV. Guests have an in-room massage and hot tub soaks. Day trips and car rentals can be arranged at the tour desk. The hotel also provides a business center and meeting rooms. Enjoy Japanese cuisine at Century Tsukiji or international delights at Cafe in the Park. Other dining options include snacks by the pool-side Palm Grove, sandwiches at Deli Snack and cocktails drinks/afternoon tea at the Atrium Lounge. Robinsons Place Manila is a 10-minute drive away while the nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 5.7 mi from Century Park Hotel - Multiple Use Hotel and Staycation Approved.

description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Spaces Hotel Makati - People & Pets! To save at this property, all you have to do is  A 10-minute walk from shops at the Greenbelt, Spaces Hotel Makati - People & Pets offers affordable nonsmoking rooms with free WiFi. Simply furnished, all the air-conditioned guestrooms come with a flat-screen TV, an office desk and a telephone. The private bathroom is equipped with hot and cold shower facilities. Airport pick-up and drop-off transfers can be arranged upon request at an extra cost. Laundry services and in-room massage treatments can be made available at extra charges. There is also a business center and a tour desk.

Along the Katipunan Avenue in Quezon City, the property is conveniently within a 5-minute walk of the nearest United Coconut Planters Bank, Shell Petrol Station and the Blue Ridge Subdivision. Fitted with hardwood floors, the air-conditioned rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and sitting area. The private bathroom includes shower facility, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Soleste Suites has a business center and a common lounge area where guests can relax or chill out with a book. Luggage storage, laundry service and airport shuttle can be arranged upon request for a fee. The in-house restaurant, Cafeteria, serves a tasty selection of local dishes. Meals can also be served in the privacy of guests’ rooms.
